  • Element
com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.chart

Annotation Type TPieChartField


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface TPieChartField

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      TPieData[] data
      PieCharts data

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean animated
      When true any data changes will be animated.
      boolean clockwise
      When true we start placing slices clockwise from the startAngle
      double computeMinHeight
      Charts are sized outside in, user tells chart how much space it has and chart draws inside that.
      double computeMinWidth
      Charts are sized outside in, user tells chart how much space it has and chart draws inside that.
      double computePrefHeight
      Charts are sized outside in, user tells chart how much space it has and chart draws inside that.
      double computePrefWidth
      Charts are sized outside in, user tells chart how much space it has and chart draws inside that.
      double labelLineLength
      The length of the line from the outside of the pie to the slice labels.
      boolean labelsVisible
      When true pie slice labels are drawn
      double startAngle
      The angle to start the first pie slice at
      java.lang.String title
      The chart title
      javafx.geometry.Side titleSide
      The side of the chart where the title is displayed

    • Element Detail

      • data

        public abstract TPieData[] data
        PieCharts data

      • title

        public abstract java.lang.String title
        The chart title
        Default:
        ""

      • titleSide

        public abstract javafx.geometry.Side titleSide
        The side of the chart where the title is displayed
        Default:
        javafx.geometry.Side.TOP

      • animated

        public abstract boolean animated
        When true any data changes will be animated.
        Default:
        true

      • startAngle

        public abstract double startAngle
        The angle to start the first pie slice at
        Default:
        -1.0

      • clockwise

        public abstract boolean clockwise
        When true we start placing slices clockwise from the startAngle
        Default:
        true

      • labelLineLength

        public abstract double labelLineLength
        The length of the line from the outside of the pie to the slice labels.
        Default:
        -1.0

      • labelsVisible

        public abstract boolean labelsVisible
        When true pie slice labels are drawn
        Default:
        true

      • computeMinHeight

        public abstract double computeMinHeight
        Charts are sized outside in, user tells chart how much space it has and chart draws inside that. So minimum height is a constant 150.
        Default:
        -1.0

      • computeMinWidth

        public abstract double computeMinWidth
        Charts are sized outside in, user tells chart how much space it has and chart draws inside that. So minimum width is a constant 200.
        Default:
        -1.0

      • computePrefWidth

        public abstract double computePrefWidth
        Charts are sized outside in, user tells chart how much space it has and chart draws inside that. So preferred width is a constant 500.
        Default:
        -1.0

      • computePrefHeight

        public abstract double computePrefHeight
        Charts are sized outside in, user tells chart how much space it has and chart draws inside that. So preferred height is a constant 400.
        Default:
        -1.0
